description: Single storey rear infill extension; rear roof extension incorporating Juliet balcony; re-roofing with slate roof tiles; alterations to rear and side elevational glazing; and installation and relocation of roof lights.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing and document title number(s): A100 P1 (Location Plan); A1000 P1 (Existing Site Plan); A1001 P1 (Existing Ground Floor Plan); A1002 P1 (Existing First Floor Plan); A1003 P1 (Existing Second Floor Plan); A1004 P1 (Existing Roof Plan); A1100 P1 (Existing Section AA); A1200 P1 (Existing Front & Rear Elevations);  A1201 P1 (Existing Side Elevation); A2000 P1 (Proposed Site Plan); A2001 P1 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); A2002 P1 (Proposed First Floor Plan); A2003 P1 (Proposed Second Floor Plan); A2004 P1 (Proposed Roof Plan); A2100 P1 (Proposed Section AA); A2200 P1 (Proposed Front & Rear Elevations); A2201 P1 (Proposed Side Elevation); Design and Access Statement Aug 2022.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013).
| No part of the flat roof(s) of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).

| The side elevation windows at first-floor and roof level of the hereby approved development shall at no time be openable or glazed, otherwise than in obscured glass, below a minimum height of 1.7 metres (5'7") above the relevant floor level.
Reason: To ensure that the proposed development does not prejudice the amenities of adjoining occupiers, in accordance with Policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
